statements: SELECT * FROM expenses_and_income;
SELECT project_name, expense_amount, expense_date FROM expenses_and_income WHERE expense_amount > 1000;
SELECT id, project_name, income_amount FROM expenses_and_income WHERE income_amount IS NOT NULL ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses_and_income GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT * FROM expenses_and_income WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM expenses_and_income ORDER BY project_name DESC, expense_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, project_name, expense_description FROM expenses_and_income WHERE expense_amount > 500 ORDER BY expense_amount DESC
SELECT project_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expense FROM expenses_and_income GROUP BY project_name HAVING total_expense > 1000 ORDER BY total_expense
SELECT * FROM expenses_and_income WHERE project_name LIKE '%tech%' OR project_name LIKE '%marketing%' ORDER BY project_name, expense_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT project_name, MAX(income_amount) AS highest_income FROM expenses_and_income GROUP BY project_name HAVING highest_income > 0 ORDER BY highest_income DESC
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE id = 1;
SELECT project_id, expense_type FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT expense_date, amount FROM expenses WHERE project_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM income WHERE income_source = 'Freelancing';
SELECT id, income_date FROM income WHERE amount < 5000;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_date DESC
SELECT project_id, SUM(amount) AS total_expense FROM expenses GROUP BY project_id ORDER BY total_expense DESC
SELECT project_id, expense_type, COUNT(*) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY project_id, expense_type HAVING total_expenses > 3
SELECT income_source, SUM(amount) AS total_income FROM income GROUP BY income_source HAVING total_income > 5000 ORDER BY total_income DESC
SELECT project_id, AVG(amount) AS avg_expense FROM expenses GROUP BY project_id ORDER BY avg_expense ASC
SELECT * FROM expenses;
SELECT expense_amount, expense_description FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_budget FROM projects WHERE project_budget > 5000;
SELECT project_name, project_description, project_start_date FROM projects WHERE project_end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT income_description, income_amount FROM income WHERE income_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_amount ASC, expense_date DESC
SELECT project_name, project_start_date, project_end_date FROM projects WHERE project_budget > 10000
SELECT income_description, income_amount FROM income WHERE income_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT project_name, project_description, project_budget FROM projects WHERE project_start_date < '2021-06-01' AND project_end_date > '2021-12-31'
SELECT project_id, COUNT(expense_id) AS num_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY project_id HAVING num_expenses > 5
SELECT * FROM expenses;
SELECT expense_description, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 100;
SELECT project_name, project_start_date FROM projects ORDER BY project_start_date DESC;
SELECT freelancer_name, freelancer_email, freelancer_location FROM freelancers WHERE freelancer_location = 'New York';
SELECT project_name, project_description, project_start_date, project_end_date FROM projects WHERE project_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT project_name, SUM(income_amount) AS total_income FROM projects JOIN income ON projects.project_id = income.project_id GROUP BY project_name HAVING total_income > 5000 ORDER BY total_income DESC;

SELECT freelancer_name, income_description, income_amount FROM freelancers JOIN income ON freelancers.freelancer_id = income.project_id WHERE freelancer_location = 'New York' ORDER BY income_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_start_date < '2022-01-01' AND project_end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT expense_description, expense_amount, project_name FROM expenses JOIN projects ON expenses.project_id = projects.project_id WHERE project_name LIKE '%Marketing%' ORDER BY expense_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM projects
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM projects
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects
SELECT * FROM expenses
SELECT expense_amount, expense_category FROM expenses
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_date DESC
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_phone LIKE '%123%'
SELECT income_source, SUM(income_amount) AS total_income FROM income GROUP BY income_source HAVING total_income > 5000
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username IN ('user1', 'user2', 'user3')
